text:
Some unidentified persons allegedly burgled a shop selling medicines at Kongu Nagar here

and escaped with

Rs. 1.5 lakh in cash and

a four-sovereign jewellery

kept inside a box in the shop.

Sources in Tirupur North police station, where a case was registered,

said the accused gained entry into the shop

by breaking open the shutter lock on Saturday evening.
title: Shop burgled; valuables stolen
